name: sketch
effect:
Permanently replaces itself with the target's last used move.  If that move is chatter or struggle, this move will fail.

This move cannot be copied by mimic or mirror move, nor selected by assist or metronome, nor forced by encore.

flavor_text_entries.ruby-sapphire:
Copies the foe’s last move
permanently.
flavor_text_entries.emerald:
Copies the foe’s last move
permanently.
flavor_text_entries.firered-leafgreen:
This move copies
the move last used
by the foe, then
disappears.
flavor_text_entries.diamond-pearl:
It enables the user
to learn a move used
by the foe.
Once used, the move
Sketch disappears.
